resources.string: You are only 5 steps away from your own TradeHero LIVE account!\nGo LIVE now and get US$ 100.00 to start.
Employer is regulated by a financial authority.
Worked in the finance sector for at least one year in a professional position that requires trading knowledge.
Previously attended training seminars or gained knowledge of Ayondo\'s products.
Have other relevant qualifications that you consider would assist your understanding of our services.
